tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Jody Brown is the most caring, sweet, inspirational professor. There is a lot of fieldwork/group projects so be prepared to work with others. Jody is one of those professors who cares about your learning, but the most important thing to her is how you are growing as a person.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Jody\'s class isn\'t difficult and it\'s super enjoyable. She makes her expectations very clear. She really cares about your as a person. Jody is the best professor.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Be prepared for a lot of group work and fieldwork. I usually hate group projects but everyone in this class ended up getting really close with one another which was nice. Jody is very motherly and understanding. Her deadlines are more like suggestions as long as you get your work done. Extremely easy grader. I highly recommend taking her.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Jody Brown is such a sweet lady! She asks students what their class expectations are and what they would like from her as a professor, her study guides are exactly what will be on tests, and she is very flexible with due dates. Since the class is mostly common knowledge you can participate in class without reading but the books will be needed forHW

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  INSPIRATIONAL  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Jody is such an amazing teacher! I didn\'t actually see her as a teacher, but more as a life coach. This class is very easy, and when you participate, you get a lot out of it! She\'s the sweetest woman in the world, and a great deal of her focus is on you succeeding! Highly recommend this class for anyone to take!

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Jody Brown is by far the best professor ever. IES 103, philosophy of helping was an amazing class and I learned real life tools. If you like anything to do with helping people this is such a great class.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Jody was awesome!! There was a lot of fieldwork stuff to do out of class but as long as you did it you got an A. She has flexible due dates for papers. Unlike many of the other professors I have had, she just wants you to learn and do well!! She makes class fun and keeps you engage. I wish she taught all of my classes!!

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: You don\'t have to do any of the reading to pass with an A. She is kind of like your grandma, super flexible with due dates, just wants everyone to be happy doesn\'t want to give you too much work. All class you basically just discuss the reading or powerpoint. You can buy the books and bring them to class but I never did a single reading.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (5)  Inspirational (4)  Participation matters (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I just liked her as a person, she is so nice! She really changed the way I thought about inclusion and opened my eyes. She brought chocolate every day, was fun and packed so much into each class. A truly skilled professional. I liked the guest speakers, too.
